channel.title: [Pi] PLEASE PLEASE HELP! [Pee Eye]
channel.description:
I downloaded my first server with a cache.. and well its going good and i am absoloutly in love with it but im stuck..
The server and client is off: RuneFx - Webclient ready <----- that is the thread name
and like everything is perfect except that when i look into NPCdrops.cfg i looked at corp beast
and the npc id for corp beast is 5247.. so i spawned a bunch and killed them and just testing.. now here is whats weird
in NPCdrops.cfg the corp beast link (5247) is this: 5247 592 there is only 1 line.. and that line is line 19. (im using notepad ++ so it tells me the line) and the line ends after that.. just 1 line
and 592 is ashes i know but i kept killing it and i got a blessed spirit shield and a bandos hilt and thats just from a couple of kills?! it has nothing to do with a code for bandos?? or spirit shield codes??
SOMEONE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HELP ME WHERE DO I CHANGE DROPS/VIEW THEM AND HOW DOES THIS WORK? HOW DO I MAKE A DROP RARE? PLEASE HELP ME..
Thank You so much, Chase ;D

item.title: [Pi] PLEASE PLEASE HELP! [Pee Eye]
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

The NPCdrops.cfg file is pointless for this source.
To edit monster drops, go to server>config.java

scroll down and there should be a line that says //Corp beast or something along those lines

Then if you wanted to add a new drop the format would go like…

Example: Dragon_Claws {5247,15028,1,85}, {Monster ID, Item ID, Item Quantity, Drop-rate},

Make sure you add the comma after the brackets.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] PLEASE PLEASE HELP! [Pee Eye]
item.dc:creator: @lifezjoke lifezjoke
item.description:
@lifezjoke wrote:

I downloaded my first server with a cache… and well its going good and i am absoloutly in love with it but im stuck…

The server and client is off: RuneFx - Webclient ready <----- that is the thread name

and like everything is perfect except that when i look into NPCdrops.cfg i looked at corp beast

and the npc id for corp beast is 5247… so i spawned a bunch and killed them and just testing… now here is whats weird

in NPCdrops.cfg the corp beast link (5247) is this:
5247 592
there is only 1 line… and that line is line 19. (im using notepad ++ so it tells me the line) and the line ends after that… just 1 line

and 592 is ashes i know but i kept killing it and i got a blessed spirit shield and a bandos hilt and thats just from a couple of kills?! it has nothing to do with a code for bandos?? or spirit shield codes??

SOMEONE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE HELP ME WHERE DO I CHANGE DROPS/VIEW THEM AND HOW DOES THIS WORK? HOW DO I MAKE A DROP RARE? PLEASE HELP ME…

Thank You so much, Chase ;D
